sentences.en: A caterpillar is the larva of a butterfly.
A larva metamorphose into a chrysalis and then into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 幼虫变为蛹,然後再变成蝴蝶.

sentences.en: A larva metamorphoses into a chrysalis and then into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 幼虫变为蝶蛹,再变成蝴蝶.

sentences.en: A magnified shot shows the head of a tiger swallowtail butterfly larva.
sentences.cn: 这个放大的照片显示一只凶猛风蝶幼虫的头部.

sentences.en: Adult phototaxis and first instar larva eat rotten organic matter.
sentences.cn: 成虫有趋光性,初孵幼虫喜食已腐烂的有机质.

sentences.en: I think this worm is a larva of a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这虫子是蝴蝶的幼虫.

sentences.en: Important changes in the embryo or larva will probably entail changes in the mature animal.
sentences.cn: 胚胎与幼体的重要的变异,或将引起动物成体的变异.

sentences.en: It'shows the metamorphosis of a larva into a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 它展示了从幼虫变成蝴蝶的过程.

sentences.en: Its adult stage , taking the fourth generation as the example , lasts 6.25 ( 3 - 14 ) , egg , 4.64 ( 4 - 6 ), larva, 11.92 ( 10 - 15 ) and pupa , 13.83 ( 11 - 18 ) days.
Objective To define the antiviral activity of Musca domestica larva homogenate.
sentences.cn: 目的确定家蝇幼虫匀浆液的抗病毒作用.

sentences.en: Silkworms are the larva of the mulberry silk moth.
sentences.cn: 丝蚕其实是桑树蛾子的幼虫.

sentences.en: The eggs quickly hatch into larvae.
sentences.cn: 这些卵很快孵化成幼虫。

sentences.en: The larva hatches out and lives in the soil.
sentences.cn: 幼虫孵化之后就在土壤里生活.

sentences.en: The tadpole is the larva of the frog.
Then, last year, he was sent an unusual fish larva.
sentences.cn: 随后, 也就是在去年, 他又找到一条鱼仔.

sentences.en: To define the antiviral activity of M. domestica larva hemolymph.
sentences.cn: 目的确定家蝇幼虫血淋巴的抗病毒作用.

words.tran_cn: 幼虫的；幼虫状态的；潜在的；隐蔽的

trans.tran_en: a young insect with a soft tube-shaped body, which will later become an insect with wings
